Description: Pratesi Italian Leather - San Casciano Handbag, Bruce Chianti In Italian vegetable-tanned Leather Made of Italian leather, tanned according to a technique, unique in the world, yet never replayed. The tanning uses only vegetable products (tannin, fat, tallow, etc..) And has the characteristic of age with use, becoming day by day, more and more fascination. The first age was made by applying various waxes and other natural products, whose formula is secret. The San Casciano, bag with metal snap closure, is characterized by its unique design and the large capacity of containment. Equipped with one only large internal compartment and pockets for wallet and cellulare, it also offers a highly effective LED light that goes off after thirty seconds of power. Including cotton cloth bag plush. Made in Italy Product Information Material Calf Leather Width 35 cm - 14 inch Height 23 cm - 9 inch Depth 22 cm - 8 inch Handles Leather Closing Metal Weight kg 1,2 Handmade in the Florence region of Italy. Tanned in a special technique that uses only natural ingredients, the item develops a beautiful patina as the leather matures over time. Every Pratesi piece is a finely crafted work of leather artisanship. Beautiful Brass & Stainless Steel Hardware with Superior Stitching and Lining finish. Comes with signature Pratesi dust bag to protect your piece. Dimensions: 14" (L) x 9" (H) x 8" (W). Weight: 2.6LB Single Compartment. Product may ship directly from manufacturer in Italy. Shipping is typically 3-6 days time frame. Free Personalized initials embossing is available upon request, please note embossed items are non-returnable. Shipping Free Shipping - We offer free economy shipping on all of our products. If you choose free shipping, the item will ship via the most economical shipping method available, whether it's UPS or USPS. International Shipments Most international shipments are shipped via USPS (UPS is available to Canada as well). Please allow plenty of time for the item to arrive as shipping times vary due to customs and many other factors. Please also note that the import duties, taxes and other charges are not included in the item price and are the buyer's responsibility. Store Policy Positive Feedback and Service - our number one goal is to exceed your expectations. We pride ourselves in excellent customer service and try to treat our customer the way we want to be treated. If you experience any problems with your order or product, please contact us via email or phone. We will do everything we can in order to improve your experience with us. Sales Tax - we collect sales tax for the residents of GA- 7% Payment - Please pay with PayPal. This is the most secure and reliable method of payment Item Condition - All items are brand new with original tags, unless specifically stated otherwise Contact Us - please don't hesitate to contact us with any questions or concerns you might have. You can reach us by phone or through the ebay messaging system. We we will do our best to accommodate any special orders and requests. Embossing Personalize you item for free! We offer free embossing on most of our products. All you need to do is send us the initials you want after the completion of your order. The font for all briefcases, luggage and handbags is Times New Roman size 28". The font for all wallets and smaller items is Times New Roman 14". We can also emboss company logos and other symbols for a fee- please contact us for details. Please note: embossing may take up to three additional business days.
